Setare manuala a numarului de segmente

- %a - Prescurtare ziua saptaminii - %A - Numele intreg ziua saptaminii - %b - Prescurtare numele lunii - %B - Numele intreg al lunii - %c - Data si ora reprezentate conform setarilor zonale - %d - Ziua lunii ca numar decimal (01 ? 31) - %H - Ora in format-24 (00 ? 23) - %I - Ora in format 12t (01 ? 12) - %j - Ziua anului ca numar decimal (001 ? 366) - %m - Luna ca numar decimal (01 ? 12) - %M - Minutul ca nuamr decimal (00 ? 59) - %p - A.M./P.M. indicator local pentru 12-ore ceas - %S - Secunde ca numar decimal (00 ? 59) - %U - Saptaminile anului ca numar decimal,cu Duminica prima zi a saptaminii (00 ? 53) - %w - Zilele sapatiminii ca numar decimal (0 ? 6; Duminica e 0) - %W - Saptaminile anului ca numar decimal,cu Luni prima zi a saptaminii (00 ? 53) - %x - Reprezentarea datei pentru timpul local - %X - Reprezentarea orei pentru timpul local - %y - Anii fara secole, ca numar decimal (00 ? 99) - %Y - Anii cu secole, ca numar decimal - %z, %Z - Numele timpului zonal sau prescurtarea, in functie de setar; nimic daca nu este cunoscut - %% - Procent semnatura Standard: %H:%M:%S

Hub IP / DNS (gol = toate, 'op' = unde sint operator)

Command Types: Separator: Adds a separator to the menu Raw: Sends raw command to the hub (experts only, end it with '|'!) Chat: Sends command as if you were typing it in the chat PM: Sends command as if you sent it by pm Contexts determine where the command is shown: Hub Menu: Hub tab (at the bottom of the screen) right-click menu Chat Menu: User right-click menu in chat and PM tab menu Search Menu: Search right-click menu Parameters: Name: Name (use '\' to create submenus) Command: Command text (may contain parameters) Hub: Hub ip as typed when connecting (empty = all hubs, \"op\" = hubs where you're op) To: PM recipient Only once: Send only once per user from search frame In the parameters, you can use %[xxx] variables and date/time specifiers (%Y, %m, ...). The following are available: %[myNI]: your own nick %[userNI]: the users nick (user & search context only) %[userTAG]: user tag (user & search context only) %[userDE]: user description (user & search context only) %[userEM]: user email (user & search context only) %[userSS]: user shared bytes (exact) (user & search context only) %[userSSshort]: user shared bytes (formatted) (user & search context only) %[userI4]: user ip (if supported by hub) %[fileFN]: filename (search context only) %[line:reason]: opens up a window asking for \"reason\"
Numele sub care ceilalti vor vedea directorul

/winamp - Merge cu 1.x, 2.x, 5.x (nu suporta WinAmp 3 ) - %[versiune] Versiune Numerica (ex: 2.91) - %[state] Status de play (ex: oprit/pauza/play) - %[titlu] Fereastra de titlu pt. Winamp - daca vrei sa schimbi pt. mp3s, Winamp > Pref > Input > MPEG > Titlu - %[rindtitlu] Fereastra titlu din Winamp (daca %[titlu] nu functioneaza corect) - %[procent] Procentaj (ex. 40%) - %[lungime] Lungime in minute:seconde (ex: 04:09) - %[ramas] Timp ramasin minute:seconde (ex. 03:51) - %[bar] ASCII bara progres, 10 caractere wide neincluzind brackets (ex. [----|-----]) - %[bitrate] Bitrate (ex. 128kbps) - %[sample] Sample frequency (ex. 22kHz) - %[channels] Numar de canale (ex. stereo / mono) Empty = Default String -> winamp(%[versiune]) %[state](%[titlu]) statusuri(%[procent] of %[lungime] %[bar])
ZoneAlarm a fost gasit in PC-ul tau.Este responsabil pt frecvente erori si intreruperi. dezinstaleaza-l si foloseste un alt program.
Creaza tab pentru status mesaj in huburi
Caractere apasate in loc de normale
Posteaza media spam in canalul principal
Arata preview la mesaj privat ca popup

/wmp - Works with Windows Media Player 9+ - %[version] Versiune a Windows Media Player - %[fullversion] Versiunea intreaga a Windows Media Player - %[status] Preformat status de la Windows Media Player - %[title] Nume piesei actuale - %[elapsed] Timp trecut in (HH:)MM:SS - %[percent] Timp trecut aratat in procente - %[bar] ASCII progress bar, 10 caractere late fara margini (ex. [----|-----]) - %[length] Lungimea totala (HH:)MM:SS - %[artist] Numele artistului - %[album] Numele albumului - %[genre] Genul - %[bitrate] Bitrate pentru piesa - %[year] Anul aparitiei albumului (no WMP9 support) - %[size] Marimea piesei actuale - %[rating] Rating, reprezentat cu *'s (if available) Empty = Default String -> +me %[title] at %[bitrate] <Windows Media Player %[version]>

/itunes - For iTunes media spamming - %[version] Versiune (ex: 7.0.2.16) - %[album] Nume album - %[artist] Artist - %[title] Nume piesa - %[genre] Gen - %[elapsed] Timp trecut in minute:secunde - %[percent] Timp trecut aratat in procente - %[bar] ASCII progress bar, 10 characters wide no including brackets (ex. [----|-----]) - %[length] Marimea totala - %[bitrate] Bitrate (kbps) - %[frequency] Frecventa (kHz) - %[year] Anul aparitie albumului/inregistrarii - %[size] Marimea fisierului - %[state] Status iTunes (playing/stopped) Empty = Default String -> +me playing: %[title] at %[bitrate] <iTunes %[version]>

/mpc - For Media Player Classic media spamming - %[filename] Name of the file currently playing - %[title] Name of the currently playing item (without file extension) - %[size] Size of the file currently playing - %[state] Current state of Media Player Classic (playing/paused/stopped) - %[elapsed] Time elapsed in minutes:seconds - %[percent] Time elapsed presented as percentage from total length - %[bar] ASCII progress bar, 10 characters wide no including brackets (ex. [----|-----]) - %[length] Total length of the current file Empty = Default String -> +me playing: %[title] <Media Player Classic>
